description: Development of hybrid and electric vehicle powertrain and sub-system mathematical models. Simulations of drive cycles for evaluating component, sub-system, or package performance in the vehicle for fuel economy and emissions.

optimized_prerequisites.prerequisites_text: Graduate/professional standing or declared in Capstone Certificate in Powertrain Electrification

prerequisites.prerequisites_text: Graduate/professional standing or declared in Capstone Certificate in Powertrain Electrification
